explanation: [0-0] A man in a purple shirt stands sideways next to a white wall. On the wall is a colorful piece of paper with an eye pattern. The man leans against the wall, his hands resting on the paper. He has gauze taped over his right eye with an adhesive bandage, and his face shows pain.

[0-4] The man touches the paper and places his right hand on the eye. He lowers his head and kisses next to the eye on the paper, then rests his head on the paper and continues to touch the eye several times with his right hand, his face filled with pain. The scene then switches to a man in a black shirt walking over. He bends over, hands on his legs, and laughs. Then, he limps forward, points with his right index finger, throws his head back and laughs, points forward with both hands, then bends down, puts his hands on his hips, and continues laughing.
